This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] :has-slotted does not match or querySelector when there are no assigned nodes
  assert_false: slot element should not match :has-slotted expected false got true
[FAIL] :has-slotted does not match or querySelector when there are no assigned nodes (flattened)
  assert_false: slot element should not match :has-slotted expected false got true
[FAIL] :has-slotted does not when child nodes are replaced (flattened)
  assert_false: slot element should not match :has-slotted after empty expected false got true
Harness: the test ran to completion.
